data.name: label12.Text
data.value:
.Right click on PureVFN icon in system tray and restart as Admin.
.Go to Setting and then click App Settings.
.Connect VPN.
.Click on VPN Hotspot in the menu and enable VPN Hotspot
Note:To manage VPN Hotspot and set Network SSID and password,Click on Manage VPN Hotspot.

data.name: label13.Text
data.value:
Click the Menu on the top right corner of the app:
1.Select 'Multi Port'
2.Toggle Multiport to "On"
3.Connect using purpose or location
Autotmatic port selection scans for open ports to bypass port blocking and connects to the best availabe port(Port range 5500-55000)automatically.
You can also select a particular port manually on the multiport screen.
If you still have any questions,feel free to drop us an email at help@purevfn.com or join us on 24/7 live chat

data.name: label18.Text
data.value:
In order to login the app using a different account,you need to do the following:
1.First logout from the app [See FAQ # 3] Click Apply and OK.
2.Enter your Desired Username and Password to login

data.name: label34.Text
data.value: PureVFN also offers a seprate Mobile account which only works on smart mobile devices.If you're using a Mobile account Username and Password,then it will cause disconnection issues in the Windows App

data.name: label32.Text
data.value:
If changing protocol isn't working for you,then the firewall of your router might be causing this issue.In this case we would suggest you to:
1.Open your router's security settings and disable SPI Firewall
2.Add your computer/device to DMZ zone.

data.name: label29.Text
data.value:
If changing protocol isn't working for you,then the firewall of your router might be causing this issue.In this case we would suggest you to:
1.Open your router's security settings and disable SPI Firewall
2.Add your computer/device to DMZ zone.

data.name: label8.Text
data.value: We started our journey back in 2007,and since then we have come a long way.With time we have managed to not only improve our service,but have been able to offer innovative features and proprietary apps simultaneously.Regardless of the platform or device in question,we have you covered.

data.name: label10.Text
data.value: PureVFN specifically caters indidviduals and businesses in dire need of an online protection that renders them invisible form ccybercriminals,third-party agencies along with their ISPs.We wholeheartedly believe in a free internet,where one can be safe and at ease, without any hassles whatsoever.

data.name: label19.Text
data.value: PureVFN's ides forum is where our users can voice their opitinion,share their suggestions,identify improvements, and point out our mistakes.Our team is looking forward to your feedback and addressing it at the earliest.
